example.description: This example deletes the inline policy named AccessToEC2Policy that is embedded in the IAM user named Bob.

example.code: $inlinepols = Get-IAMUserPolicies -UserName Theresa foreach ($pol in $inlinepols) { Remove-IAMUserPolicy -PolicyName $pol -UserName Theresa -Force}
example.description: This example finds all of the inline polices that are embedded in the IAM user named Theresa and then deletes them.
